text: The Walt Disney Studios is an American movie and entertainment studio. It is one of the four business segments of The Walt Disney Company. It is based in Burbank, California. It was founded in 1923 and is the fourth-oldest and one of the "Big Five" major movie studios. ==References== Category:1923 establishments in California Category:Disney companies Category:Companies based in Burbank, California Category:American movie studios
title: Walt Disney Studios (division)
